
```python
import string
import pandas as pd
ser = pd.Series(list(string.ascii_lowercase))
# make your Series readable by giving its name
ser.name = 'alphabets'

# take elements
index = [0, 4, 8, 14, 20]
ser.take(index)  # ser.get(index, default=None)
'''
    0     a
	4     e
	8     i
	14    o
	20    u
	dtype: object
'''
# reshape to df
df = pd.DataFrame(ser.values.reshape(2,13))
```
